Robust red meat from a cow. Brodia exports a deluxe brand that comes with a hefty price tag.
Meat from a pig. This common meat is popular due to its availability and low cost.
This meat is said to be an efficient source of nutrients for building muscle.
Sheep meat with a distinctive aroma. People either love it or hate it.
A vegetable found in the Somniel garden. It doesn't do well in heat, but it thrives in cold weather.
A vegetable found in the Somniel garden. It tastes slightly sweet when eaten raw.
An aromatic culinary addition that improves taste or adds an attractive garnish.
A popular vegetable most commonly grown in Firene, where they grow many appealing varieties.
Grown in Firene, Solm, and Brodia. This vegetable eased the postwar famine a thousand years ago.
A strange vegetable said to bring good fortune. It grows in very few places, and it cannot be cultivated.
A common kitchen staple found in all manner of foods.
A fruit found in the Somniel orchard. Popular since ancient times, it also appears in various fairy tales.
The most common fruit in Firene. It is a Firenese specialty and does not grow anywhere else.
A soft and delicious fruit grown exclusively in the Somniel orchard. It used to be gifted to visiting royals.
A fruit found in the Somniel orchard. It grows in bunches, so it is often shared in groups.
A small fruit that grows in many regions. It is a familiar snack for the people of Firene and Brodia.
A fruit found in very few regions. Sometimes called "ghost fruit" as the tree dies after a single season.
A label used for all common tree nuts. Some are dried and some are very small.
Samian herring that has been prepared for cooking.
Caria carp that has been prepared for cooking.
Tipa salmon that has been prepared for cooking.
Valcamonic cod that has been prepared for cooking.
Myceen eel that has been prepared for cooking.
Big-eyed sardines that have been prepared for cooking.
Fish chopped into small pieces.
A whole dried fish that has been prepared for cooking.
Fresh fish sliced into elegant pieces.
Unusual fish found in the Somniel pond and prepared for cooking. It is rich in healthy nutrients.
Dairy from animals such as cows, goats, and sheep.
A popular ingredient produced by a bird.
A common refined grain.
Plant seeds used in cooking. They come in a variety of shapes and sizes.
Seasoning extracted from plants. Commonly used in cooking to adjust aroma, flavor, and color.
An artisan fills each tea bag by hand with freshly plucked leaves. Favored by fans of tea parties and cooking.
A well-aged dried meat popular as a portable snack. Favored by fans of meat and folk food.
Made with the milk of select alpacas, one bite will transport you to green pastures. Favored by fans of dairy.
Roasted in the open fire and made without seasoning to bring out its flavor. Favored by fans of yams.
A stone weight that can be held by hand or tied to the leg. Favored by fans of training and exercise.
Apply to muscles after working out to avoid soreness. Favored by fans of training and exercise.
A tightly sealed bottle of pungent treats that will draw all kinds of creatures. Favored by animal fans.
A tool used to carve intricate designs on wood. Favored by fans of crafting and weapons.
A picture book containing many short and wondrous tales. Favored by fans of reading and fairy tales.
A diverse book of poetry including submissions from the public. Favored by fans of reading and daydreaming.
A complex introductory text for students of reason and meaning. Favored by fans of studying.
Scripture written by Divine Dragon worshippers passed down through the ages. Favored by pious believers.
A thick book detailing the history of Elyos and its regions. Favored by fans of reading and studying.
A small bottle of perfume made from the essence of fruit and flowers. Favored by fans of fashion.
A light and long-handled net made especially for catching bugs. Favored by fans of animals and bugs.
The visor protects the face and neck from sunburn. Favored by fans of exercise and walks as well.
This popular blossom is the national flower of Lythos. Favored by Lythian fans of flowers.
This popular blossom is the national flower of Firene. Favored by Firenese fans of flowers.
This popular blossom is the national flower of Brodia. Favored by Brodian fans of flowers.
This popular blossom is the national flower of Solm. Favored by Solmic fans of flowers.
This popular blossom is the national flower of Elusia. Favored by Elusian fans of flowers.
Used for cooking. With luck, one can be found with four leaves. Favored by fans of cooking and herbs.
A hollow animal horn that makes a loud noise. Has no holes for playing notes. Favored by fans of music.
A handmade wreath often displayed on doors or walls. Favored by fans of flowers and cute things.
A charming pink apron embellished with embroidery and frills. Favored by fans of cooking and cute things.
Bait to lure fish made with the most appetizing worms. Favored by fans of fishing.
A handy tool that includes a knife, scissors, etc. Favored by fans of crafting, weapons, and cool things.
The realistic details make this wooden ornament shine. Favored by fans of animals and cute things.
This compact, well-organized sewing kit is handy in a pinch. Favored by fans of sewing and knitting.
A soft ball of yarn spun from the fresh wool of young sheep. Favored by fans of sewing and knitting.
A fancy handkerchief made from shiny, hand-woven cloth. Favored by fans of luxury, cleaning, and fashion.
A one-of-a-kind quill pen made from a rare bird's feather. Favored by fans of luxury, studying, and writing.
A decorative dagger with a finely wrought haft and sheath. Favored by fans of weapons.
These eco-friendly earrings made from antlers shed by deer are popular in Solm. Favored by fans of fashion.
Picture cards used for various group games. Favored by children and fans of parties and games.
Very spicy powdered red seeds that can add a kick to any dish. Favored by fans of spicy food and folk food.
A postcard depicting a beautiful landscape. There's space to write a note. Favored by fans of nature.
An exclusive candle etched by hand with an elaborate design. Favored by fans of fashion, luxury, and parties.
A thick encyclopedia detailing all kinds of creatures. Favored by fans of animals and bugs.
A rolled-up parchment inscribed with weird symbols to ward off spirits. Favored by fans of scary stories.
A large and practical plate that holds food for multiple people. Favored by fans of cooking and parties.
Mainly used for tending wounds or bracing joints and muscles to prevent injury. Favored by fans of training.
A round, smooth, and pretty rock found lying on the ground.
A gem that shines with many colors. Found only in the Somniel, especially near \0. Favored by all.
Ordinary horse manure. That's it. You could technically give it to someone, but why would you?
A simple rod suited for catching small fish. Its lack of flexibility lets you catch fish with less force.
An advanced rod suited for catching mid-sized fish. The rod bends when heavy fish bite so it will not break.
A powerful rod that can handle any large fish. Small fish won't even bite. Built exclusively for master anglers.
